scripts.precodegen: rimraf src/types src/mappings/chainlink/aggregators/*.ts && npm run config graphgen
scripts.start: npm run create:local && npm run deploy:local
scripts.deploy:local:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=phuture/ia env-cmd npm run deploy:local
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=phuture/ia env-cmd npm run deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=hvrlk/Phtr env-cmd npm run deploy:hosted
